verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> when they offered<WH7126> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and died;<WH4191>

And the goat<WH8163> shall bear<WH5375> on him all<WH3605> their iniquities<WH5771> to a land<WH776> not inhabited:<WH1509> and he shall let go<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

And Aaron<WH175> shall come<WH935> into<WH413> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation, and shall put<WH6584> off the linen<WH906> garments,<WH899> which<WH834> he put<WH3847> on when he went<WH935> into<WH413> the holy<WH6944> place, and shall leave<WH5117> them there:<WH8033>

And he shall wash<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> with water<WH4325> in the holy<WH6918> place,<WH4725> and put<WH3847> on his garments,<WH899> and come<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and offer<WH6213> his burnt<WH5930> offering, and the burnt<WH5930> offering of the people,<WH5971> and make an atonement<WH3722> for himself, and for the people.<WH5971>

And he that let go<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> for the scapegoat<WH5799> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> in water,<WH4325> and afterward<WH310> <WH3651> come<WH935> into<WH413> the camp.<WH4264>

And the bullock<WH6499> for the sin<WH2403> offering, and the goat<WH8163> for the sin<WH2403> offering, whose<WH834> blood<WH1818> was brought<WH935> in to make atonement<WH3722> in the holy<WH6944> place, shall one carry<WH3318> forth<WH3318> without<WH2351> the camp;<WH4264> and they shall burn<WH8313> in the fire<WH784> their skins,<WH5785> and their flesh,<WH1320> and their dung.<WH6569>

And he that burns<WH8313> them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> in water,<WH4325> and afterward<WH310> <WH3651> he shall come<WH935> into<WH413> the camp.<WH4264>

And this shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> to you: that in the seventh<WH7637> month,<WH2320> on the tenth<WH6218> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> you shall afflict<WH6031> your souls,<WH5315> and do<WH6213> no<WH3808> work<WH4399> at all,<WH3605> whether it be one of your own<WH249> country,<WH249> or a stranger<WH1616> that sojournes<WH1481> among<WH8432> you:

It shall be a sabbath<WH7676> of rest<WH7677> to you, and you shall afflict<WH6031> your souls,<WH5315> by a statute<WH2708> for ever.<WH5769>

And the priest,<WH3548> whom<WH834> he shall anoint,<WH4886> and whom<WH834> he shall consecrate<WH3027> to minister in the priest's<WH3547> office in his father's<WH1> stead,<WH8478> shall make the atonement,<WH3722> and shall put<WH3847> on the linen<WH906> clothes,<WH899> even the holy<WH6944> garments:<WH899>
